ATK DEF HP +16%
+5% Defense
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+5% Defense
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Split Boulders
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000016_1_2]</color> chance to increase the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000016_1_2] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Break Surface
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to inflict Stunned by 15%

description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000016_2_2]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Stunned</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000016_2_2] turn(s)</color>.\nDamage dealt increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Terminate Protection
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000016_3_2]</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000016_3_2] turn(s)</color>.\nIncreases damage dealt proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase Defense for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000016_chain_1_1]</color> chance to increase Defense for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000016_chain_1_1] turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Damage increases proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Defense</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
